data.name: Big Farm Story - Fluffy Snow Pack
data.detailed_description:
A true friend comes with a snub nose, fluffy fur and cute little rabbit teeths. Enjoy our new DLC that brings you an exclusive pet.

New Pet
What has fur as white and is more fluffy than freshly fallen snow? Our new pet, a little Snow Hare
data.about_the_game:
A true friend comes with a snub nose, fluffy fur and cute little rabbit teeths. Enjoy our new DLC that brings you an exclusive pet.

New Pet
What has fur as white and is more fluffy than freshly fallen snow? Our new pet, a little Snow Hare
data.short_description: It's getting cold outside. The snow lies like icing sugar on the meadows and trees. Quietly, the snow falls. It’s time to wrap up warm and enjoy our new Winter DLC that brings you an exclusive pet.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Czech, Russian, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
